info-des: helps you to buy the dip while making
info-des-tow: A smart vault helps you to buy the dip while making
how-it-works-des: Assuming BTC price is now $22000, Alice wants to buy the dip if it drops to $20000.
no-dip-hunter-des: Place limit orders on Binance at $20000, then wait for the order to fill.
scenario-a-des: BTC Price rise to $25000. Alice’s order didn’t fill.
scenario-b-des: BTC Price drops to $19000 and Alice’s order was filled at $20000. She now has 1 BTC at hand.
with-dip-hunter-des-two: on Deri Protocol, collect funding payment as long as the position holds.
with-dip-hunter-secenario-a-des: Alice won’t be able to buy BTC at $20000, but the everlasting options position is generating a daily income for Alice all the time.
with-dip-hunter-scenario-a-the: The total income of put selling BTC options is calculated as
with-dip-hunter-scenario-a-the-volume: Volume * (Entry Price - Exit Price) + Avg. Daily Funding * Holding Period = +$1291.85
with-dip-hunter-secenario-b-des: Thanks to the continuous daily income, Alice will probably be able to buy more than 1 BTC with her account balance
with-dip-hunter-scenario-b-the: The total income of put selling BTC options is calculated as
with-dip-hunter-scenario-b-the-volume: Volume * (Entry Price - Exit Price) + Avg. Daily Funding * Holding Period = +$1418
with-dip-hunter-scenario-b-alice: Alice has an initial deposit of $20000. Now the account balance is $21418. She can buy 1.127 BTC, which is 0.127 BTC more than she expected.
value-strategy-des: The vault earns yield on its BUSD/USDC/USDT deposits by selling cash covered ETH-1000-P directly to market makers on Deri Protocol.
waiting-for-confirmation-title: Please confirm transaction in your wallet
waiting-for-confirmation-desc: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
